mutants.original_line: return [x | y for (x, y) in zip_longest(a1, a2, fillvalue=d)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [x & y for (x, y) in zip_longest(a1, a2, fillvalue=d)]

mutants.original_line: return [x | y for (x, y) in zip_longest(a1, a2, fillvalue=d)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [x ^ y for (x, y) in zip_longest(a1, a2, fillvalue=d)]
